plan.summary: A focused roadmap to master Be A Programmer through fundamentals, deliberate practice, and reflective improvements.
plan.motivation: Stay consistentï¿½Be A Programmer rewards small, steady wins. Celebrate each completed milestone and share progress with your accountability circle.

milestones.title: Be A Programmer Fundamentals
milestones.description: Learn the key concepts that define Be A Programmer. Focus on vocabulary, methodologies, and the mindset needed to excel.
resources: Official Be A Programmer foundations guide
Hands-on introductory challenges for Be A Programmer

milestones.title: Practice Be A Programmer Skills
milestones.description: Apply what you learn through curated exercises tailored to Be A Programmer. Track progress, capture reflections, and iterate on mistakes.
resources: Official Be A Programmer foundations guide
Hands-on practice challenges for Be A Programmer

milestones.title: Build a Be A Programmer Project
milestones.description: Consolidate your knowledge by delivering a portfolio-ready project aligned with your Be A Programmer objective.
resources: Official Be A Programmer foundations guide
Hands-on project-based challenges for Be A Programmer

milestones.title: Reflect & Optimize
milestones.description: Review outcomes, gather feedback, and adjust the next steps to keep momentum toward Be A Programmer.
resources: Official Be A Programmer foundations guide
Hands-on reflection challenges for Be A Programmer
